sentence: In trading on Friday, shares of Salesforce.com Inc (Symbol: CRM) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $159.29, changing hands as high as $161.33 per share.
Salesforce.com Inc shares are currently trading up about 2.2% on the day.

The chart below shows the one year performance of CRM shares, versus its 200 day moving average:

Looking at the chart above, CRM's low point in its 52 week range is $115.29 per share, with $195.72 as the 52 week high point — that compares with a last trade of $160.02.

The CRM DMA information above was sourced from TechnicalAnalysisChannel.com
